mapper.insert: insert into loudsourcingapply(loudsourcing_no, artist_no, reg_date, entry) VALUES (#{loudsourcing_no}, #{artist_no}, #{reg_date}, #{entry})
mapper.select: select * from loudsourcingapply WHERE loudsourcing_no = #{loudsourcing_no} AND entry = true
select * from loudsourcingapply WHERE is_pre_selected = true AND loudsourcing_no = #{loudsourcing_no}
select * from loudsourcingapply WHERE is_pre_selected = false AND loudsourcing_no = #{loudsourcing_no}
select * from loudsourcingapply WHERE is_selected = true AND loudsourcing_no = #{loudsourcing_no}
